de.engehausen.treemap

Interface IGenericTreeMapLayout<N,T extends java.lang.Number>

  • Type Parameters:
    N - the type of node the layout supports.
    T - the weight type.
    All Superinterfaces:
    ITreeMapLayout<N>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericSquarifiedLayout

    public interface IGenericTreeMapLayout<N,T extends java.lang.Number>
extends ITreeMapLayout<N>
    Tree map layout interface for different kinds of weighted tree models. The weight in these kinds of models may be any extension of Number. The methods allow to create a layout of rectangles from a given weighted tree model.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ITreeModel<IRectangle<N>> layout(IGenericWeightedTreeModel<N,T> treeModel, N startingNode, int width, int height)
      Creates a layout of rectangles, starting at the current node for the given width and height.
      ITreeModel<IRectangle<N>> layout(IGenericWeightedTreeModel<N,T> treeModel, N startingNode, int width, int height, ICancelable cancelable)
      Creates a layout of rectangles, starting at the current node for the given width and height.

      • Methods inherited from interface de.engehausen.treemap.ITreeMapLayout

        layout, layout

    • Method Detail

      • layout

        ITreeModel<IRectangle<N>> layout(IGenericWeightedTreeModel<N,T> treeModel,
                               N startingNode,
                               int width,
                               int height)
        Creates a layout of rectangles, starting at the current node for the given width and height.
        Parameters:
        treeModel - the tree model to lay out
        startingNode - the starting node in the tree model the layout operates on; must not be null.
        width - the width to use for the layout.
        height - the height to use for the layout.
        Returns:
        a tree model holding the rectangles representing the used nodes in hierarchical order, never null.

      • layout

        ITreeModel<IRectangle<N>> layout(IGenericWeightedTreeModel<N,T> treeModel,
                               N startingNode,
                               int width,
                               int height,
                               ICancelable cancelable)
        Creates a layout of rectangles, starting at the current node for the given width and height.
        Parameters:
        treeModel - the tree model to lay out
        startingNode - the starting node in the tree model the layout operates on; must not be null.
        width - the width to use for the layout.
        height - the height to use for the layout.
        cancelable - an indicator that can cancel the layout operation if ICancelable.isCanceled() returns true. The argument must not be null. If the operation is canceled, the result may be incomplete.
        Returns:
        a tree model holding the rectangles representing the used nodes in hierarchical order, never null.
